function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High reliance on foreign demand and value-added in production leading to exposure to foreign shocks","Impact":"Lowered economic efficiency and stability of key macroeconomic variables","Mitigation":"Diversification of sales and value-added sources, reduction of reliance on foreign demand","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, trade analytics tools","People":"Economies with high reliance on foreign demand and value-added in production","Owner":"Governments, economic policy makers"},{"Description":"High centrality of 'hubs' in GVC networks magnifying shock propagation","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to shock propagation, potential disruption of knowledge spillovers","Mitigation":"Diversification of network connections, promoting decentralized collaborations","Technologies":"Network analysis tools, collaboration platforms","People":"Companies and organizations with central roles in GVC networks","Owner":"Business leaders, industry associations"},{"Description":"Concentration of suppliers or clients making some firms and supply chains vulnerable to shocks","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to supply chain disruption, potential negative impact on comparative advantage and specialisation","Mitigation":"Supplier diversification, risk management strategies","Technologies":"Supply chain optimization software, risk assessment tools","People":"Firms with concentrated supplier or client bases","Owner":"Supply chain managers, procurement professionals"}]}
